tweets.text: @annjsmall @poppers82 @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe Not really coping tonight, terrible headache. One eye at the point I can hardly see it is so sore and the stench is worse than ever. Where do we go from here? We just cannot keep on this way? @AaronBell4NUL we need urgent, and I mean urgent action. This is now an emergency.

@poppers82 @HelenVi00175623 Also near the root of the red lines, it is absolutely horrific, started at 8pm like a wall of stench and still so so strong. The wind is supposedly in the other direction. @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL enough really is enough. Either get us evacuated or sort it.
@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA It is getting worse in #newcastleunderlyme there is no break, whatever you do is making it worse. We cannot keep on like this. @StinkStopthe

Can you smell this @AaronBell4NUL? 

I now have eyes burning, I cannot open my windows,it stinks throughout my property. 

Trying is not enough. This is a major incident. Where is is council evac plan?@EnvAgency seem to be making this WORSE with every change at the stink.

Can some1 explain this 2me? How the gas is travelling this wide of a triangulation probably more than this and further at a level 6 Hanford roundabouts THEN try telling me it isnâ€™t a major incident. Iâ€™ve no doubt itâ€™s as strong everywhere between the wind lines +the red lines âš ï¸ https://t.co/79XZcwavx4

@fayedavies @poppers82 @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe Hope you are ok, horrendous tonight,surely this can't go on, every night for hours and hours & still @ClareDinnisEA does nothing. 29 days since she solved the problem & it's worse, laughing stock of world, environment, she couldn't even spell it.

@fayedavies @GarethSimkins @alan49479451 @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @Unchecked_UK @EnvAgency @TheENDSReport Yes it comes to something when the authorities &govt let you down this badly that thereâ€™s barely anywhere else to turn.We have to remember that despite being let down there are still people with a social and environmental conscience trying to help.I really really appreciate that

The annoyance level for hydrogen sulphide (h2s) is 7 ugm3. 

Would anyone at the EA like to comment on why we are seeing figures as high as 1017 ugm3. 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/G4jobNaxsi

@EnvAgencyMids you currently assess H2S from against annoyance (30 min avg 7ug/m3) and health (24hr avg 150ug/m3), what are the effects of several hundred ug/m3 for 12 hours day after day? This is our nightly reality. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL
For once a lovely warm night perfect for sitting out & keeping windows open BUT NOT HERE IN NORTH STAFFS thanks to @RedIndustries2. How can this be right? @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL #StopTheStink

Absolutely raw tonight. My throat is burning, I have a pounding headache and I actually feel like I am chocking and that is total fact. HOW ON EARTH IS THIS ALLOWED? @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA
